Question & Options:
What is the relationship between Will, Amy, and Batman in the context of the evacuation?
Options:
A. Will is in a romantic relationship with Amy.
B. Batman warns Will and Amy about the evacuation.
C. Will has unresolved feelings for Amy.
D. Amy is the reason for the evacuation.
Correct Answer: a) Will is in a romantic relationship with Amy., b) Batman warns Will and Amy about the evacuation., c) Will has unresolved feelings for Amy.
